flawed_nl_solution:
He gets his pool cleaned 30/3=<<30/3=10>>10 times a month
Each time he gets it cleaned he tips 150*0.1=$<<150*0.1=15>>15
So he pays 150+15=$<<150+15=165>>165
So he pays 165*10=$<<165*10=1650>>1650 a month on cleaning
The chemicals cost 200*2=$<<200*2=4000>>4000
So in total, he pays 1650+4000=$<<1650+4000=5650>>5650

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 4000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
